languages.text: "Я стал перебирать в памяти все донесения о пропавших кораблях, что были за мою службу. И что-то выводы в свете новой информации меня не радуют..."
languages.translation_comment:
After making it off a planet infested with Genestealers.
Cassia: "Those beings that settled on Jesevon... I have never heard of such xenos. Their psychic shadow in the warp... it is simply monstrous."

traits.locale_text: "Я стал перебирать в памяти все донесения о пропавших кораблях, что были за мою службу. И что-то выводы в свете новой информации меня не радуют..."

languages.text: "I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."
languages.translation_comment:
After making it off a planet infested with Genestealers.
Cassia: "Those beings that settled on Jesevon... I have never heard of such xenos. Their psychic shadow in the warp... it is simply monstrous."
languages.original_text: "Я стал перебирать в памяти все донесения о пропавших кораблях, что были за мою службу. И что-то выводы в свете новой информации меня не радуют..."

traits.locale_text: "I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the conclusions..."
"I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the conclusions..."
"I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."
"I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."
"I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."
"I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."

languages.text: 「ここ数年で目にしてきた行方不明の船の報告を、ずっと思い返していました。ですがこの新たな情報を踏まえると、嫌な予感がします…」
languages.original_text: "I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."

traits.locale_text: 「ここ数年で目にしてきた行方不明の船の報告を、ずっと思い返していました。ですがこの新たな情報を踏まえると、嫌な予感がします…」

languages.text: "Ich habe mich an all die Berichte über verschwundene Schiffe erinnert, die ich im Lauf der Jahre gesehen habe. Angesichts dieser neuen Informationen bin ich etwas beunruhigt ..."
languages.original_text: "I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe mich an all die Berichte über verschwundene Schiffe erinnert, die ich im Lauf der Jahre gesehen habe. Angesichts dieser neuen Informationen bin ich etwas beunruhigt ..."

languages.text: « Cela me fait penser à tous les rapports que j'ai vus au fil des ans concernant des vaisseaux disparus. Je n'aime guère ce que suggèrent ces nouvelles informations... »
languages.original_text: "I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."

traits.locale_text: « Cela me fait penser à tous les rapports que j'ai vus au fil des ans concernant des vaisseaux disparus. Je n'aime guère ce que suggèrent ces nouvelles informations... »

languages.text: «Me vienen a la memoria todos los informes de naves desaparecidas que he visto a lo largo de los años. A la luz de esta nueva información, no me gustan las implicaciones...».
languages.original_text: "I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."

traits.locale_text: «Me vienen a la memoria todos los informes de naves desaparecidas que he visto a lo largo de los años. A la luz de esta nueva información, no me gustan las implicaciones...».

languages.text: “我一直在回想这些年看过的失踪舰船报告。如今得知了这些新的情报，我真的很不喜欢我得出的结论……”
languages.original_text: "I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."

traits.locale_text: “我一直在回想这些年看过的失踪舰船报告。如今得知了这些新的情报，我真的很不喜欢我得出的结论……”

languages.text: "Onca yıl gördüğüm tüm kayıp gemi raporlarını düşünüyorum da... Öğrendiklerimizi düşününce sonuç hiç iç açıcı değil."
languages.original_text: "I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."

traits.locale_text: "Onca yıl gördüğüm tüm kayıp gemi raporlarını düşünüyorum da... Öğrendiklerimizi düşününce sonuç hiç iç açıcı değil."

languages.original_text: "I've been recalling all the reports of missing ships I've seen over the years. In light of this new information, I don't like the implications..."
